Text:
Check out my site:
http://www.psmods.com/forum.php

We've got tutorials on modding your PS3, transferring PS3 games from your PC to your PS3, getting black-screen games to work, and steps to get more games working on your Multiman install.

I could confirm it, but I'm the uploader lol. Anyways, could anyone who downloads seed for at least 12-24 hours? It would really help the other people trying to get the game.

Oh, and when the game works, could you post a response on here if you have a TPB account?
Works great on Kmeaw 3.55, thanks Fantafaust!!
